Name: ROU CONG RONG
rou cong rong
Biological: Boschniakia glabra C. A. Mey. (Japanese variety)

Geography: Japan (Boschniakia glabra C. A. Mey.; Japanese variety)
Maladies Treated: impotence: due to shenyangxu (kidney yang deficient) condition
constipation: due to qixu (qi deficient) or blood deficient
yeast infection from cold deficient womb
bleeding of the kidneys and/or bladder
Contraindications:
Not to use in case of diarrhea due to pixu (spleen deficient).
Not to use in patient with heat sign.
Notes:
Variant names and host plants:
肉蓯蓉 also called: 蓯蓉, 大芸, 淡大芸, 甜大芸, 寸芸, 梭梭大芸; mainly parasitic on 梭梭 and 白梭梭.
管花肉蓯蓉: also called 紅柳大芸; mainly parasitic on 檉柳屬植物 (Tamarix spp.).
鹽生肉蓯蓉: also called 白刺大芸; parasitic on 白刺, 鹽爪爪, 紫]柴, 芨芨草 and other plants.
沙蓯蓉: also called 紫蓯蓉; often parasitic on 四合木, 霸王, 珍珠柴, 紫柴, 綿刺, 藏錦雞兒, 沙冬青 and other plants.
白花鹽蓯蓉: mainly parasitic on 珍珠柴.
草蓯蓉: often parasitic on 樺木科東北楷木.
Chemical Ingredients: Contains trace alkaloids and crystalline neutral substances.
Mi rou cong rong (迷肉蓯蓉) contains alkaloids.
Contains multiple iridoids: cistamin (肉蓯蓉素), cistachlorine (肉蓯蓉氯素), and cistanosides A, B, C, D, E, F, G (肉蓯蓉甙A–G).
Additional isolates reported: cistanosides H and I (肉蓯蓉甙 H, I) and decaffeoylacteoside (去咖啡酰基類葉升麻苷).

Geography: Now found in the temperate zone of the world
Samples of Formulae: For chronic diarrhea: Air-dry Ji Cai (shepherds' herb), grind into powder, take 6 g each time with a decoction of Hong Zao (Red Date / Jujube). [4]
Contraindications: Not to use during pregnancy or during breast feeding. Use with care in patients with heart and lung diseases. [1]
Chemical Ingredients: Potassium, calcium, sodium, iron, chlorine, phosphorus, manganese (鉀、鈣、鈉、鐵、氯、磷、錳)
Gossypetin hexamethyl ether (棉花皮素六甲醚)
Robinetin (洋槐黃素，又名刺槐乙素)
References: [1] Ri Hua Ben Cao 日華本草
[2] Zhong Hua Ben Cao 中華本草
[4] Ri Hua Ben Cao 日華本草

Name: xiang si zi
相思子
Common: English: coralhead plant seed, rosary pea
Vietnamese: Cam thảo d漧, cườm thảo đỏ, chi chi, cườm cườm, tương tư đằng, tương tư thảo, cảm sảotiếng T輇), hương tư tử

Medical Function: Induces vomiting to expel wind-phlegm (湧吐風痰)
Treats tinea / fungal infection of skin (療癬)
Samples of Formulae: External application: smash the seeds and apply to the affected area.
Contraindications:
According to the book “Southern Area Toxic Vegetation,” the leaves, roots, and seeds are all toxic, with the seeds being the most toxic.

Poisoning symptoms include: poor appetite, nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain, diarrhea, difficulty in breathing, skin bruising (cyanosis), circulatory failure, and oliguria; eventually hemolysis and hematuria may occur, followed by gradual respiratory suffocation and death.

Treatment methods include: induce vomiting or perform gastric lavage, then catharsis; inject normal saline or 5% glucose solution; to prevent deposition of heme or its products in the kidney, take baking soda 5–15 grams per day. If hemolysis is severe with respiratory difficulty, administer oxygen, give a small amount of blood transfusion, use central nervous system stimulants, and perform artificial respiration.

If taken orally, it is very toxic and must be used with great care.

Seed: Methyl ester of N, N-dimethyltrypto-phan methocation

Vietnamese: Cam thảo d漧, cườm thảo đỏ, chi chi, cườm cườm, tương tư đằng, tương tư thảo, cảm sảotiếng T輇), hương tư tửDistribution:產地﹕Fujian, Taiwan, Guangdong, Guangxi and Yunnan provinces of China.分佈福建，台灣，廣東，廣西及雲南等地。Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕bitter, neutral and toxic.苦，平，有毒。Channelsmeridians) entered: 歸經﹕heart, lung.心，肺。Medical functions:藥理﹕  Actions & Indications:主治﹕For expelling watery phlegm, rid of parasitic worms and fungal infection of skin, stop itchiness. For treating: strokes, scabies,  eczema. Usually for external use. Smash and apply. If taken orally, be aware it is very toxic and must be used with care.涌吐風痰，殺虫療癬，燥濕止痒。治中風，疥癬，濕瘡。外用：搗爛涂敷患處。如內服須防中毒。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕Seed contains:種子含:1-Abrine相思子鹼Abraline相思子靈Hypaphorine下箴刺桐鹼Methyl ester of N， N-dimethyltrypto-phan methocationN，N- 二甲基色氨酸甲酯的甲陽離子Precatorine相思豆扔Choline膽鹼Trigonelline胡蘆巴鹼Abrin相思子毒蛋白Squalene角鱉烯β-Amyrinβ-香樹脂醇Cycloartenol環木菠蘿烯醇Stigmasterol豆甾醇β-Stigmasterolβ-谷甾醇Campesterol菜油甾醇5β-Cholanic acid5β-膽烷酸Abrussic acid相思子酸Flavonoids黃酮化合物Iron, lead, calcium, silicon, magnesium, sulfates, phosphates鐵，鉛 ，鈣，硅，鎂，硫酸鹽及磷酸鹽Skin of seeds contain:種子皮含：Gallic acid0.6～0.8%沒食子酸Abranin相思子甙precatorine紅豆鹼hypaphorine海巴沸寧鹼methyl ester of N,N- dimethyl tryptophan海巴沸寧鹼甲酯trigonelline胡蘆巴鹼choline膽鹼asparagic acid天冬氨酸L-cystine胱氨酸amide酰胺Amino acid氨基酸β-sitosteroleβ-谷甾醇Stimasterole豆甾醇Campesterol菜油甾醇brassicasterol菜籽甾醇Cycloartenol環木菠蘿甾醇Qualene鯊烯β-amyrinβ-香樹脂素Gallic acid沒食子酸abrin A,B相思子毒蛋白A，Babrus agglutinin相思子凝集素lectin植物凝血素5-β-cholamic acid5-β-膽烷酸anthocyanin花色素Daily Dosage:每日用量﹕Mainly being used externally.外用。Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕ Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕According to the book, "Southern Area Toxic Vegetation", the leaves, the roots and the seeds are all toxic. The poisoning symptoms include: poor appetite, nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain, diarrhea, difficulty in  breathing, skin bruising, circulatory failure and oliguria, and eventually  hemolysis, hematuria, and gradually respiratory suffocation and death may happen. Treatment methods include vomit inducing, gastric lavage, catharsis, and injection of saline or 5% glucose solution; prevent heme deposition in the kidney or take 5 to 15 grams of baking soda per day. If hemolysis is severe with respiratory difficulty,  use oxygen, a small amount of blood transfusion and the use of CNS stimulants, and artificial respiration. "《南方主要有毒植物》："相思豆，葉，根，種子有毒，以種子最毒。中毒症狀：表現為食欲不振，惡心，嘔吐，腹痛，腹瀉，呼吸困難，皮膚青紫，循環系統衰竭和少尿，最後出現溶血現象，尿血，逐漸呈現呼吸性窒息而死亡。解救方法：催吐或洗胃，然後導瀉，並注射生理鹽水或5%葡萄糖鹽水；防止血紅素或其產物在腎中沉澱，可每日服小蘇打5～15克；如溶血嚴重並有呼吸窒息現象時，要給氧，小量輸血及使用中樞興奮劑，行人工呼吸。" Search this siteProblems with website? Name: zhui di feng
di feng pi
Other name: nan ning di feng pi 南寧地楓皮

Geography: China: southwestern Guangxi province; southern Guangdong province
Maladies Treated: Abdominal pain due to qi stagnation (氣滯腹痛)
Menstrual abdominal pain in women (婦人經期腹痛)
Dosage:
Internal: decoction 9–15 g per day.
External: boil with water and wash affected areas.
Samples of Formulae:
Postpartum arthritis (產後身疼，關節紅腫灼痛)
Name of formula: Qing Re Chu Bi Tang (Rid of heat and arthritis decoction)
Application: Pain in the body; joints red, hot, and swollen with burning pain.
Composition (metric version): Ren Dong Teng (Honeysuckle stem) 30 g, Wei Ling Xian (Clematis root and rhizome) 9 g, Qing Feng Teng (Sinomenium stem) 15 g, Hai Feng Teng (Piper kadsura vine) 15 g, Luo Shi Teng (Trachelospermum vine) 15 g, Fang Ji (Stephania tetrandra root) 9 g, Sang Zhi (Mulberry twig) 30 g, Zhui Di Feng (Illicium difengpi bark) 9 g. Preparation: Boil with water and use as tea.
Functions: Qing re san shi (clears heat and disperses dampness), shu feng huo xue (disperses wind and activates blood). Postpartum body pain, joints red, swollen, and burning pain.
Composition (original units as recorded): Ren Dong Teng 1 liang, Wei Ling Xian 3 qian, Qing Feng Teng 5 qian, Hai Feng Teng 5 qian, Luo Shi Teng 5 qian, Fang Ji 3 qian, Sang Zhi 1 liang, Zhui Di Feng 3 qian.
Source: Gynecology Experience of Liu Feng Wu (劉奉伍婦科經驗).

Bronchitis (支氣管炎)
Ingredients and preparation: Hai Feng Teng (Piper kadsura vine) 2 liang, Zhui Di Feng (Illicium difengpi bark) 2 liang. Soak in 1 jin of white liquor for 1 week. Dosage: Take twice daily, 10 mL each time, in the morning and evening on an empty stomach. Do not warm when taking; otherwise it will be ineffective. Contraindications: Patients with heart disease and pregnant women are forbidden; suspend during common cold and menstruation. Source: 《全展選編‧內科》.
Contraindications:
There are two types of di feng pi recorded: Nanning di feng pi (real; from Illicium difengpi B.N. Chang et al.) and Guilin di feng pi (false; from Illicium jiadifengpi B. N. Chang var. jiadifengpi and Illicium majus Hook. f. et Thomas). The latter are false substitutes that may cause serious poisoning and must not be used as substitutes for di feng pi. Identification: Nanning di feng pi is small tubular or finger-shaped, aromatic, crisp and easily broken, with a granular fractured surface; after soaking in water, no mucus oozes out. The adulterants are generally plate-like, groove-like, or half-cylinder-like; after drying they show slight camphor aroma, are hard and not easy to break, with a flat cross-section; thick mucus oozes out after soaking in water.
This herb is slightly toxic.
Specific to the bronchitis tincture formula: Do not warm the dose before taking; otherwise it loses efficacy. Patients with heart disease and pregnant women are contraindicated; suspend during common cold and menstruation.
References: [2] Gynecology Experience of Liu Feng Wu 劉奉伍婦科經驗
[3] Illicium difengpi B. N. Chamg et al. in Acta Phytotax. Sin. 15: 76-77. f. 1. 1977; 中國樹木志1: 525. 1983.
Original Text: zhui di feng, Complementary and Alternative Healing UniversityComplementary and Alternative Healing University   中藥詞典                 Chinese Herb Dictionary      Search this site     在本網站找資料Search this siteList of Health ProblemsChinese Herb DictionaryQigongTraditional Chinese Medicine (TCM)AcupuncturePrescribed Drug DictionaryBiochemistry DictionaryLecture SlidesResearch LibrarianGeneral Online LibraryResearch SitesViagraMassage/AcupressureHypnotherapyTell us what you wantNotify Changes & New Information  di feng pi   地楓皮  ( in English and Chinese 中英文)by: Joe Hing kwok Chu    朱興國編 譯   Pharmaceutical name:英文藥名﹕Cortex IlliciiBotanical name:拉丁生物學名﹕Illicium difengpi K.I.B.et K.I.M.Pron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕sanjifuPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕ Pron. in Cantonese::粵音﹕zeoi1 dei6 fung1Other Names:別名﹕ zhui di feng追地風zuan di feng鑽地風nan ning di feng pi南寧地楓皮di feng地風di feng pi地楓皮Common Name:英文名﹕ Distribution:產地﹕south western part of Guangxi province and southern part of Guangdong province.廣西西南部、廣東南部。Propertiescharacteristics﹕性味﹕slightly acrid, astringent, warm, slightly toxic.微辛、澀，溫；有小毒。Channels meridians entered: 歸經﹕bladder, kidney膀胱、腎。Medical functions:藥理﹕  Actions & Indications:主治﹕For treatment of arthritis, numbness with pain, abdomen pain due to qizi (qi stagnation), pain during menses in women.治療風濕痺痛、 氣滯腹痛、婦人經期腹痛。  Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕Contain evaporating oil 0.30%-0.71%, among them:含揮發油0.30%-0.71%，內有：α and β-pineneα-和β-蒎烯camphene樟烯1,8-cineole1，8-桉葉素linalool (12.93%)芳樟醇 (12.93%)safrole  (23.61%)黃樟醚  (23.61%)camphor樟腦germacrene D (5.35%)大牛兒烯 D (5.35%)bornylacetate乙酸龍腦酯myrcene月桂烯 (香葉烯)Daly Dosage:每日用量﹕Take orally, in decoction 9 - 15 g.External application: boil with water and use it to wash affected areas.內服：煎湯，9 -15克。外用：煎水洗。Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕For postpartum arthritis [2]Name of Formula: Qing Re Chu Bi Tang (Rid of heat and arthritis decoction)Application: Pain in the body, red, hot and swelling in jointsComposition: ren dong teng 30 g, wei ling xian 9 g, qing feng teng 15 g, hai feng teng 15 g, luo shi teng 15 g, fang ji 9 g, sang zhi 30 g, zhui di feng 9 g.Boil with water and use as tea.   方名: 清熱除痺湯 （劉奉伍婦科經驗）功效: 清熱散濕，疏風活血。 主治: 產後身疼，關節紅腫灼痛。組成: 忍冬藤1兩，威靈仙 3錢，青風藤 5錢，海風藤  5錢，絡石藤 5錢，防己 3錢，桑枝1兩， 追地風 3錢。 支氣管炎：海風藤、追地風各二兩。用白酒一斤，浸泡一周。日服二次，每次10毫升，早晚空腹服。服時不可加溫，否則失效。心臟病人及孕婦忌服，感冒及月經期暫停服。(《全展選編�內科》)Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕There are two types of di feng pi: one is called Nanning di feng pi that comes from the plant Illicium difengpi BN Chang et al. Historically it has been used as di feng pi. Another is called, Guilin di feng pi, that comes from the plant Illicium jiadifengpi BN Chang var jiadifengpi and a plant called da ba jiao (literally, large octagon),  Illicium majus Hook. f. et Thomas, which are false substitutes. Using themmay cause serious poisoning. They should not be used as a substitutes for di feng pi. Users should distinguish between the real and false items. Nanning di feng pi has the traits of: small tubular or finger shape, with good aroma, crisp, easily broken, and fractured surface shows particles. After soaking the herb in water, no mucus oozing out. The adulterated herb generally shows plate-like and groove-like, half cylinder like, after drying shows some camphor aroma and the texture is hard and difficult to break, and the cross section is flat. Thick mucus oozes out after the herb is soaked in water. [3]�地楓皮�有兩種：一種叫南寧地楓皮是歷來藥用的。其原植物即地楓皮 Illicium difengpi B.N. Chang et al. ；另一種叫桂林地楓皮，其原植物為假地楓皮 Illicium jiadifengpi B. N. Chang var. jiadifengpi和大八角  Illicium majus Hook. f. et Thomas.是地楓皮的偽品。服用會引起 嚴重中毒，不能代替地楓皮入藥，應分清真偽，注意鑒別。南寧地楓皮藥材性狀為小筒狀或指狀，氣芳香、鬆脆，易折斷，折斷面顆粒性。藥材用水浸泡後，無粘液滲出，而偽品地楓皮藥材性狀一般為板狀、槽狀、半卷筒狀，干後微具樟木香氣，質地較堅硬，不易折斷，斷面較平整。藥材用水浸泡後有濃厚粘液滲出。[3][1]J Insect Sci.2011 ; 11():152.[2]Gynecology Experience of Liu Feng Wu 劉奉伍婦科經驗[3] Illicium difengpi B. N. Chamg et al. in Acta Phytotax. Sin. 15: 76-77. f. 1. 1977; 中國樹木志1: 525. 1983.Search this siteProblems with website? Please Click here for comment. Geography: China (throughout), especially in Anhui, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Guangdong, Guangxi, Sichuan
Maladies Treated: Eye redness and swelling pain due to liver and gallbladder constrained heat (肝膽郁熱所致的目赤腫痛)
Excessive tearing and photophobia (多淚羞明)
Headache and head distention (頭痛頭脹)
Samples of Formulae:
Acute conjunctivitis: Cao Jue Ming (Cassia seed), Ju Hua (Chrysanthemum flower), Huang Qin (Scutellaria root). Decoction with water; drink.
Hypertension: Cao Jue Ming (Cassia seed), Ju Hua (Chrysanthemum flower), Xia Ku Cao (Prunella spike). Add water, decoct, and drink as tea.
Contraindications: Not to use in case of diarrhea, cold or influenza.

Seed (general): cassiaside B, C (決明子甙 B, C)
alaternin-1-O-β-D-glucopyranoside (意大利鼠李蒽醌-1-O-葡萄糖甙)
Seed of Cassia tora (小決明種子): toralactone-9-β-gentiobioside (決明種內酯-9-β-龍膽二糖甙; 即是決明子甙C)

決明子；cao jue ming 草決明by: Joe Hing kwok Chu        (in English and Chinese 中英文)Pharmaceutical name:英文藥名﹕Semen CassiaeBotanical name:學名﹕Cassia tora, L.; Cassia obtusifolia LPron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕ketsumeishiPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕kyolmyongjaPron. in Cantonese:粵音﹕kyut3 ming4 zi2Other Names:別名﹕cao jue ming 草决明，jue ming zi 決明子，ma ti jue ming 馬蹄決明，ma ti cao 馬蹄草，jia lu dou 假綠豆。Common Name:英文名﹕cassia seedDistribution:產地﹕throughout China, especially in Anhui, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Guangdong, Guangxi, Sichuan.全國均産，尤其在安徽，江蘇，浙江，廣東，廣西，四川等省 。Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕salty, neutral.鹹，平。Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕liver, kidney, large intestine.入肝，腎 ，大腸。Medical functions:藥理﹕  Actions & Indications:主治﹕for treatment of amaurosis, cataract, conjunctivitis, red, swollen painful eyes, headache, chronic constipation, hypertension, liver diseases.用於肝膽郁熱所致的目赤腫痛，怕光流淚，頭痛。治青盲內障，結膜炎，目赤腫痛，多淚羞明，頭痛頭脹，慢性便秘，高血壓，肝臟疾患。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕ The seed contains:決明種子含:chrysophanol大黃酚physcion大黃素甲醚obtusifolin美決明子素chryso-obtusin黃決明素obtusin決明素aurantio-obtusin橙黃決明素gluco-obtusifolin葡萄糖基美決明子素gluco-chryso-obtusin葡萄糖基黃決明素gluco-aurantio-obtusin葡萄糖基橙黃決明素rubrofusarin紅鐮玫素cassiaside決明子甙torosachrysone決明蒽酮isotoralactone異決明種內酯cassialactone決明子內酯2，5-dimethoxyben-zoquinone2，5-二甲氧基苯醌toralactone決明種內酯emodin大黃素aloe-emodin蘆薈大黃素chrysophanol-9-anthro-ne大黃酚-9-蒽酮cassiaside 是決明子甙C)chrysophanol-1-O-［β-D-glucopyranosyl1→3）-O-β-D-glucopyranosyl-1→6）-O-β-D-glucopyranoside］大黃酚-1-O-三葡萄糖甙，chrysophanol-1-O-β-D-glucopyranosyl-1→ acid天冬氨酸γ-hydroxyarginineγ-羥基精氨酸Also, the oil of the seed contains small amount of:又種子油中含少量malvalic acid錦葵酸sterculic acid蘋婆酸campesterol萊油甾醇β-sitosterolβ-谷甾醇Dosage:用量﹕10～15克。Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕Acute conjunctivitis: cao jue ming,  ju hua, huang qi. Add water and make into decoction and use as tea.Hypertension: cao jue ming, ju hua, xia ku cao.  Add water and make into decoction and use as tea.急性結膜炎: 草决明，菊 花，黃 芩。水煎服 。高血壓：草决明，菊 花，夏枯 草。水煎服。Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕not to use in case of diarrhea, cold or influenza.泄瀉者或風寒外感者忌用。　Sponsors' Ads by Google 以 下為谷歌所提供之廣告  A manuscript... writing, translating and proofreading              in progressProblems with website?
